# Outside: Item
## Examine the difference between *Novel* and *Familiar* curiosity groups
```{r, echo = FALSE}
baseline          <- lme(CorrSeenHit ~ 1, random = ~ 1|SubjectNo/Group, data = Curiosity.Recall.Old.Novelty[!SubjectNo %in% bad.ps.less.strict], method = "ML", na.action = na.exclude)

versionModel      <- update(baseline,     .~. + Version)
noveltyModel      <- update(versionModel, .~. + Group)
interactionModel  <- update(noveltyModel,  .~. + Version : Group)

anova(baseline, versionModel, noveltyModel, interactionModel)
```

## Compare "Early" and "Late"
```{r, echo=FALSE}
baseline          <- lme(CorrSeenHit ~ 1, random = ~ 1|SubjectNo/Group/ItemOrderType, data = Curiosity.Recall.Old.Order.Novelty[!SubjectNo %in% bad.ps.less.strict], method = "ML", na.action = na.exclude)

orderModel        <- update(baseline,       .~. + ItemOrderType)
noveltyModel      <- update(orderModel,     .~. + Group)
versionModel      <- update(noveltyModel,    .~. + Version)

ord.rt.Model      <- update(versionModel,   .~. + ItemOrderType : Group)
ord.vs.Model      <- update(ord.rt.Model,   .~. + ItemOrderType : Version)
rt.vs.Model       <- update(ord.vs.Model,   .~. + Group : Version)

interactionModel  <- update(rt.vs.Model,    .~. + Version : Group : ItemOrderType)

anova(baseline, orderModel, noveltyModel, versionModel, ord.rt.Model, ord.vs.Model, rt.vs.Model, interactionModel)
```

### Parameters
```{r, echo=FALSE}
summary(ord.vs.Model)$tTable

contrast.matrix <- rbind(
  "Immediate: Late - Early"     = c(0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0),
  "Delayed:   Late - Early"     = c(0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1)
  )
postHocs <- glht(ord.vs.Model, contrast.matrix)
summary(postHocs, test = adjusted("none"))
```

## Compare "Early" and "Late"
```{r, echo=FALSE}

noveltyModel      <- update(orderModel,     .~. + Group)
versionModel      <- update(noveltyModel,    .~. + Version)
```

### Parameters
```{r, echo=FALSE}

```
